body:
Comment 15: 
Just for the record: The initial compiler behavior didn't match the current spec
proposal either: For instance, make([]int, -1) led to a runtime error; the spec now
requires a compile-time error (and still does, in the playground:
http://play.golang.org/p/ymMO1dCI8E ).

Hopefully with the pending CL 6903048 we'll get all pieces to mutually agree.
